description: Set the distractions aside in write in a relaxing place of your creation! I've wanted something like this for years but I've never found anything with this level of functionality! Great work.

I just installed this program and find it brilliant. Those folks finding the page size and font size small can easily reset this in the Themes item in top menu, click on Custom and you can set the background, page size, font type and size, margins, etc.  This should be maintained in the saved document, but will no doubt have to be reset for every new document as it would be in any other word processor.  I found a page width of 1200 pixels a comfortable size.  Play around with it and get to know it.  A manual would be good, but I didn't find one on the website; but then, there isn't really all that much to learn which is why most folks here like it.
summary: Different page sizes can be easily set

description: It can't use any images and the toolbars look like they came out of 2010

This app would be nice if you could change the font size. But I find it very strange that you would create this word processor app, and neglect the need to change the font sizing. This seems like a major oversight, and pretty ableist as well. 

Here are some things to consider:
- Include the ability to change font size.
- Also include Font Line Height as a separate option. This will allow the text to fill the page with as much space that's comfortable for the user. I think this would look very nice.
- You could consider changing color & font weight, but I think Font Size & Line Height would go really far.
summary: Word Processor But Can't Change Font Size
